clean(self)

source code 

Cleans plotting structure (e.g. deleted) Also gets rid of nonexisting figures if they've been deleted by an outside source. This method is a little clumsy since it has to spawn a dummy plot if a plot has been deleted, but who cares, it works.

clear(self, refresh=True)

source code 
Overrides: common.args.clear
